mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.roles.RAException
mdException.label: Registry Administrator Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Adminstrator in order to perform this action.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.OrganizationRAException
mdException.label: Organization Registry Administrator Exception
mdException.message: You must be a Registry Adminstrator of the [{organizationLabel}] organization in order to perform this action.
